_sText:
mapped by Panza @ WWW.DEUTSCHMASCHINE.DE

- randomweapons every new round
- everyone has the same weapon!
- weapons will not stay on the ground
- grenade boxes upstairs
- deactivating the iceblocks will open the door
- press the red button for kniferound

Credits:

mapped by panza
based on the classic iceworld idea, original author unknown to me

music while kniferound:
artist: "AND ONE"
Title: "Bodynerv" (unreleased Instrumental)
Album "I.S.T"
Web: www.andone.de

passing F22 Jet, modified by Panza
based on original prefab-model by charli
(http://www.gamebanana.com/members/846898)

passing Helicopter, modiefied by Panze
based original prefab-model by thegregster101
(http://www.gamebanana.com/members/935932)

passing big plane & the tower, modified by Panza
based on original brushwork by BMCha and Echo 199
token from Gary's Mod Map "GM_Skydive2008_rc1"

the bridge based on a prefab by Mr. Rampage
(http://www.gamebanana.com/members/1025145)

displacements of the ice blocks token from
fy_iceworld_real, Key Author "psycho321"

Barbed Wire Fence Prefab by Blunt-Trauma studios

Searchlights in the corners, modified by Panza
based on the Prefabs from Battlemech7
(http://www.gamebanana.com/members/160269)

The Fan was token from "Fibbs' Fan Pack"
(http://www.gamebanana.com/members/351633)

the button programmings for the "he give boxes"
were made by skillor
http://www.gamebanana.com/members/229015
the model for the box was made by valve

textures from the ice blocks token from 
SC:S IcePac 1
http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/765

Automatic Door, retextured and modified by panza
based on a prefab by "Tea Junkie"
http://www.gamebanana.com/members/740749

The Alarm-Light, orinial modelled by Valve
was modified by CartraxWolf 
http://www.gamebanana.com/members/804906
token from his Prefab "Complex Blast Door"

Sky Textures ("Sky18") made by Komaokc
http://www.gamebanana.com/members/289553

thanks to our beta testers:

duni, mete & iggi @ Deutschmaschine

special thanks to Atzi :)

Best German Gameserver in the Net:

DEUTSCHMASCHINE
Camping allowed, No Snipers, Relaxed People:) 
web: www.deutschmaschine.de
Counter Strike since 2002

Happy Death!

PANZA
